name: cropper
content:
come a cropper
Add to word list
Add to word list
to fail badly, or to fall from a horse or have a bad accident in a vehicle: If outside buyers or suppliers lose faith, a company can come a cropper very quickly. She came an almighty cropper when her back wheels hit an icy patch.
